00011 LI_EXPORT data_integer * status_counter_get_counter(const char *s, size_t len);
00012 LI_EXPORT int status_counter_inc(const char *s, size_t len);
00013 LI_EXPORT int status_counter_dec(const char *s, size_t len);
00014 LI_EXPORT int status_counter_set(const char *s, size_t len, int val);
00015 
00016 #define COUNTER_INC(di) if (di) di->value++;
00017 #define COUNTER_DEC(di) if (di && di->value > 0) di->value--;
00018 #define COUNTER_SET(di, val) if (di) di->value = val;

00020 #endif
